name: Wing Rain-jo
description:
Wing Rain-jo

This is the game I made for Go Godot Jam 3.

Game Description

The premise of the game is to control the player to hit the Plus sign to gain score and surviving. On gaining a score the horizontal movement and vertical movement will be switch. On collecting the dust, the player will gain more moves. On collecting more dusts the player speed will increase and bigger size. On hitting the barb the game will be over.

Controls

Arrow Keys: move the player

Enter: restart
